text: The Mickey Mouse universe is a made up universe which houses a lot of stories that involve Disney characters from their many cartoons. The main characters featured in their cartoons include which is the setting for stories involving Disney cartoon characters Mickey and Minnie Mouse, Donald and Daisy Duck, Pluto the dog and Goofy. == Mortimer Mouse == Mortimer is not a friend of Mickey Mouse. He was developed in the 1930’s. Mortimer Mouse always says a certain phrase, which is “Ha Cha Cha". Category:The Walt Disney Company
title: Mickey Mouse universe
